nodes.text: The Mist Patrol was a military division of the Hapan Royal Navy.

This part of the Hapes Consortium's Navy was tasked with patrolling the boundaries of the Transitory Mists where they searched for intruders that invaded their territory in the years after the Yuuzhan Vong War.
After the Battle of Kuat and the Second Battle of Fondor, the Mist Patrol agreed to keep the secret of the Jedi base on Shedu Maad.
